title: For atmatrisha will there would be bus for ec campus students

comments.body: My foot they will provide bus.
Mostly yes, it will be arranged

They’ll probably arrange buses for students, But if not, Then take 600F from the Hosa Road stop (if I’m not wrong about the correct stop for the EC campus). Then, go to Banashankari TTMC. From there, you can take 410FA 501. These are all buses I know.
